alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:34AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McPherson, Rice, Ellsworth and southern Saline Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 434 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Windom, or 7 miles northwest of Inman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lyons, Lindsborg, Ellsworth, Sterling, Moundridge, Inman, Galva, Canton, Kanopolis, Marquette, Little River, Chase, Holyrood, Assaria, Bushton, Geneseo, Brookville, Alden, and Lorraine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 44 and 83. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 210 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central and south central Kansas.
